source_comments:
Not a chance. Very can’t get past logia bullshit but let’s just say he can.

He still loses.

It’s Minato, Boruto and then Naruto.

Spoilers ahead!!! 




Minato created the Rasengan in 3 years, it was in his teens. Not sure when exactly but he had in his light novel and I believe he was in his late teens then.

He was around early twenties when he died. I believe  he was like 21 or something like that. But anyway he created the jutsu that is heralded as the pinnacle of shape transformation jutsu when he was in teens.

He improved/perfected the Flying Raijin. And he was a seal master on par with the Uzumaki’s. 

Boruto did only take about three days to add a nature release to the Rasengan. He wasn’t the first to do it sick Naruto has done it. He did do it faster than Naruto though, much faster.

Boruto also recreated the Flying Raijin. It’s different to Minato’s and weaker I believe but he did re create it.

Edit: I did forget about Rasengan Uzuhiko which is a very cool variation of the Rasengan.

But most of Boruto’s power comes from his Karma Seal.

Naruto’s comes from Kurama and his massive chakra reserves.

Minato is just a badass. He didn’t come from any big clan or have any special kekkei genkai or power.

He is just pure talent.

That is why I say the list is Minato - Boruto - Naruto.

Yeah my bad bro.

Even without that aspect of Wood Release Hashi would likely still win.

Yep I’m wrong. I don’t know why I thought it was only Tailed Beast Chakra.

So with that rule then Hashi could suppress Kuzan’s Haki since “Haki = Chakra”.

People using the Pubk Hazzard fight as scaling for Kuzan is mental. We didn’t see anything about the fight. We just got statements. Just because they fight for 10 days doesn’t mean they were going all out for every single hour of every single day.

Hashirama wins.
If doesn’t, it suppresses/absorbs Tailed Beast Chakra and that’s it. Pretty the “Haki = Chakra” thinf is just so Hashi can actually get though Kuzan’s Logia.

Yeah he can teleport instantly. Minato can’t kill Hashirama but neither can Hashirama. The only way is to get rid of all of Minato’s marks and I doubt Hashi could find all of them.

Two minato’s constantly teleporting around the field will be insanely hard to track either with Hashi’s abilities.

Three is an ez win for Minato. Two Minato’s would be able to win as well but it’d be much harder.

I like the look of the new ban system. I love how it’s more strategic. But the best part are the updates graphics for sure.

I had a good pc and I would like for its power to be used by R6 lol.

Doc’s changes also sound pretty good for the game.
I was successfully rage baited until I saw Kazuma

https://preview.redd.it/kvs8bs29xj0f1.jpeg?width=358&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=2e21e1c9658015be17c7fc83e913a0959be23eca

I’m done for but at least he’ll look cool whilst we both die.
This is why spotters are a thing

Oh really damn. I thought he just had what Luffy had. 

…and now I realise that’s stupid because of what Gear 5 told us.

I’m not sure if Rak can get through the whole Mochi body thing.

Yamato and Fuji get absolutely beat. Then if Rak can’t get through the Mochi body since he doesn’t have Haki then Pain just uses Human Path and yoinks Katakuri’s soul.

Yeah with ease. He’s a beloved war hero and the fourth Hokage. Konoha loves him. He knew Obito/Tobi was behind the attack, he would’ve said so and everyone would’ve believed him.

He likely wouldn’t be very happy with Hiruzen and Danzo for sending the Uchiha to guard the border as well.

Minato is just a nice dude. It’s also not a stretch to suggest he was friends with Fugaku since it was confirmed Kushina and Mikoto were best friends. 

He would’ve easily stopped the coup if it even had a chance to happen in the first place.

So the obvious choice is to gain powers that are similar to Wukongs ability.

So outright shapeshifting into multiple animals transformations would be cool.
 
Hiruzen was really goood with a Bo staff so the hilly to augment your Bo Staff with sage chakra and change its length and size would be sick.

Enhanced agility and nimbleness is obvious. Potentially the ability to make a sage chakra tail if you perfect sage mode. Imperfect will just have a tail lol.

Wukong has even more powers that could be turned into sage mode techniques but I arent that knowledgeable about him.

Edit: my dumbass forgot about his clone ability. You could make clones but they were truly perfect copies that follow your orders. So they take a lot of damage before they pop an disappear. Even more than the likes of wood clones.

Edit 2: so just thought of something else for the clone ability. You could have it be a single clone but one that’s a truly perfect copy. You’re completely indistinguishable except for the fact that the clone has a time limit of about 30 mins.

So it has blood and can die like a normal human, except it’s completely subservient. 

If you want to nerf it a bit. You could have it basically be a second body for you. So you have two bodies basically, you can control them both.

It would then fit that Hiruzen didn’t attain the sage mode so me you could make it insanely hard to master to the point that Emma never met anyone he believed could learn the sage mode.

Also Enma can teach, Hiruzen’s Monkey King Summon.

Bro why are Goku, Vegeta, Gogeta on here. They ain’t red heads lol

As much as I love Hashirama and Madara, they lose here. Even if Itachi doesn’t have the Totsuka Blade or the Yata Mirror the Jonin team still has Kotoamatsukami and Tsukuyomi.

Now this is a lot interesting to think about if we distracted those two abilities and say for some reason Shisui and Itachi can’t use them.

I believe the Jonin team has a chance. It’s unfortunate that we don’t really now the full extent of Fugaku, Shisui and Sakumo’s power so I can’t give an accurate answer.

All of them were said at some point to be strong ninja. Asuma is irrelevant in this fight, he does nothing unfortunately since I like Asuma.

We saw in the war arc an Eight Gate Guy can almost beat Juubidara so Eight Gate Guy beats Prime Madara on his own in my opinion.

So that basically just leaves the rest versus Hashirama. Unfortunately we also don’t know much about prime Hashirama except that he can beat Prime Madara and The Kyuubi together.

I honestly don’t know if Hashirama would lose or win. Let’s assume that guy dies just after he kills Madara so he can’t use the eight gates gassing Hashirama.

Hashirama has a massive advantage in this fight. Just looking at what he was capable of in his fight with Madara. The Kanon is just sick.

I believe most of the Jonin would survive that attack simply because Kakashi can send them to the Kamui dimension or Minato can teleport them away.

In the end I believe it comes down to longevity. I believe with Minato teleporting around and potentially saving people from death or Obito pulling the focus on him and using Kamui to dodge attacks, they could last a good amount of time.

Unfortunately I do think they’d lose. I don’t believe they have the attack power to put Hashirama down for good.

Summary: With Koto and Tsukiyomi, the Jonin’s win. Without those two technique, Hashirama and Madara win.

There are genuine reasons for hating her but if you get tot end of Shippūden and into Boruto then you’re hating just for the sake of hating.

I hated her in Part 1, she was that annoying useless girl who always got in the mc’s way. But she redeemed herself in part 2.

I mean one of the first instances big points we see her, she kicks the ever loving shit out of Sasori’s puppets. That was cool as hell.

Sakura definitely redeemed herself in Shippuden or at least she did in my opinion.

The three win. Loads of people say assume wins but he just doesn’t. Yes Sasuke gets stomped easily but the only way Asuma can beat Naruto is by decapitating him. Naruto literally regenerated a fuckin hole in his stocmah.

And fifth gate Lee is faster than Asuma.
Every version of Sasuke up until Sasuke gets Six paths chakra/the Rinnegan.
Obito is, for sure. The guy practically mind controlled a perfect Jinchuriki for years with one genjutsu.

Naruto wins. His reserves are just too immense and if it’s a battle to the death, Kurama will likely say the same thing to Naruto as he did Gaston Isshiki and then out comes Baryon Mode and Sasuke dies.

However if Naruto doesn’t want to kill Sasuke like how the other fights have been then Sasuke has a better chance.

Sasuke would likely have more chakra considering he was on several missions in the blank period meaning he likely had to fight on several occasions this would increase his reserves.

He’d likely actually use the Rinnegan so he has an instant win condition in the form of the human path.

We’ve already seen Naruto deal with Amaterasu using his cloak and genjutsu is useful because of Kurama.

I’d say Naruto wins even this matchup simply because he can outlast Sasuke. His stats are better and he can likely just overwhelm Sasuke with clones so Sasuke can’t use the human path on him.
Makima for sure. Even without her power she’s good looking and manipulative as fuck so she’ll be great on the stand.

Boruto wins with ease. The Karma Marking is an absolutely op buff.
Hashirama sweeps with ease. I don’t even need to explain.

We aren’t fully sure why no one told him. Most people somehow couldn’t make the obvious deduction he was. The only Uzumaki in Konoha was Kushina so people should’ve definitely clicked he was Kushina’s son and she was seen pregnant for 9 months. It should’ve been obvious.

Now as to why the people who knew didn’t tell him. I’m pretty sure it’s because Minato has a shit load of enemies, the Hidden Stone for example that would want to kill Naruto as revenge.

But this isn’t that good of a reason considering he has the name Uzumaki and is also a Jinchuriki so the target on his back can’t really get any bigger.

So let’s talk about what I know. In my opinion from the characters I know Team Japan or Korea are taking this.

I’m going off the pictures so this is original series Ben 10. This is that version of a hulk which I believe is 616. So not like Worldbreker Hulk.

Team Japan first. Goku is of course strong but I’m fairly sure Madoka and Rimuru end up or se stronger than this version of Goku which I believe is battle of gods. One punch Man is also quite powerful. I don’t know much about Sonic, I know when he gets the chaos Gem, or whatever it’s called, sonic turns into the white version and gains fucking reality warping to an extent but I’m going off the image so I think they all just die.


Team America next. Obviously Ben 10 gets destroyed. This is original series who only has 10 aliens and none of them are as strong as the likes of feedback, alien x or atomix. 

Batman with one year of prep I don’t matters at all. I think he gets destroyed by most of the opponents. Superman and Hulk are int he same boat cause I don’t think the main timeline versions are that strong compared to some of there stronger versions like world break a hulk or prime one million superman.

I don’t know anything about Spawn except his name and I think SpongeBob’s cartoon fuckery gets beat by some of the hax in this image.

Team Korea next. The obvious ones are Sung Jin Woo, Jin Mori or Sun Wukong. Now I haven’t finished God Of Higschool so I can’t say much about Jin Mori and I haven’t finished solo levelling in awhile so I can’t really comment on him but I do know both get pretty strong. I think around planetary.

The top right is the dude from Greatest Estate Developer, great read, go check it out. He isn’t that strong at all, maybe building level or something like that.

The other two I have no idea who they are.

Finally Team China. The leader is of course Game Sun Wukong as the OP said in another comment. So he doesn’t just immediately murder everyone and become immortal another 3 times. The guy ends up becoming the fighting Buddha. He strains nirvana like Buddha which is just insane so thank god this isn’t that Wukong.

The one on the bottom right is know but can’t remember the name of the anime and also haven’t watched much of it awnaywy so I can’t comment.

The one on the middle right is Hajun who I think is supposed to be really strong but again I don’t much about him so I can’t comment.
 
The rest of them I have zero clue about.



So based on all of this, I think Team Japan wins.

They likely died in the first Shinobi world war. The war that took the life of a lot of incredibly powerful Kage level ninja. MOs Tod the villages lost two Kage in the first war. So it isn’t really that surprising that we don’t see Tsunade’s parents, especially her father.

Also Hashirama and Mito’s child would be a male because of how the marriage laws work. They follow the old world stuff so because Tsuande’s last name is Senju then that likely means her father was a Senju because the bride usually takes the grooms name.

NCHammer23 on YouTube actually made a great video about this very topic. Go check him out. I can’t remember what the video name is however.
